Reviews.Title: Motorola V195s $33.00
Reviews.Author: Ron S
Reviews.Content: Motorola V195s (T-Mobile) Cellular PhoneIf you are looking for a good phone that is easy to use and really just want the basics, you should check this phone out. I used the bluetooth connection and speakerphone has decent quality and the battery lasts at least twice as long as my old phone. If you want to keep things simple, this is a good choice.

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone
Reviews.Author: Hieu Tran "DrivingBible.com"
Reviews.Content: Can talk on it clear and can hear on it clear.  texting is extremely easy and quicker than any phone i ever used. battery lasts a long time without recharging.  no set back.  this is the perfect simple phone. will definitely buy again if i can fine it.

Reviews.Title: Happy Customer
Reviews.Author: Chris K.
Reviews.Content: The Motorola V195 Is a hreat phone.  There is not as much detail on computers, no camera (what does a person with bad eye sight need with a camera?) it also sounds better then all of the other phones that I have had.  Thank You.Chris.

Reviews.Title: Replacement for My Wife's Washed V195
Reviews.Author: Marcos Plata
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her retro 'flip' phone. When she recently ran it through the washer (everything works on the old phone but the charger) we tried to have her use a 'smart' phone.That did not work out well, so this exact replacement has been happily received.Phone arrived in original box, in new condition and wife is very happy!Thank you!

Reviews.Title: Great cellphone
Reviews.Author: Kaviar
Reviews.Content: If you want a phone with no bells and whistles, this is it.  I've had several of this model.  Always consistent and just a good phone.

Reviews.Title: tom
Reviews.Author: tlb
Reviews.Content: works well. I bought it for parts and I live in south america and well it works well with the local cell phone company, just needed to change the sim
